briefTitle: Study of Brexpiprazole as Adjunctive Treatment of Irritability in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder and an Inadequate Response to Antidepressant Therapy
officialTitle: Interventional, Open-label, Flexible-dose, Exploratory Study of Brexpiprazole as Adjunctive Treatment of Irritability in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder and an Inadequate Response to Antidepressant Therapy
summary: To explore the anti-impulsive and anti-aggressive properties of brexpiprazole in a naturalistic setting of depressed patients with irritability.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 6 in SIS Total Score
